definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Some mourners wrote inscriptions on the wooden barriers of the pools.
sentences.chinese: 有些悼念者还在水池旁的木框上写下话语。

sentences.english: The cistern empties in five minutes.
There used to be dirty pool here.
Automatically tricking water slides downwards along a filler to a pond, which eliminates the water falling sound and the drift ice phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 自淋水沿填料下滑至水池，消除了落水声和漂水现象。

sentences.english: Many regions of the country are relatively flat, but underground cisterns exist.
sentences.chinese: 该国家的很多地区相对开阔，但地下蓄水池仍存在。

sentences.english: He jumped into the pool, making a loud splash.
Your eyes are pools in Heshbon, by the gate of Bath-rabbim.
sentences.chinese: 你的眼目像希实本巴特那拉并门旁的水池。

sentences.english: A sump can catch large amounts of rain and allow it to naturally percolate.
sentences.chinese: 阿水池可以捕获大量的降雨，并允许它自然渗透。

sentences.english: This site was flanked by a pair of lotus ponds, _and_to the north was a round fountain.
sentences.chinese: 五竹亭北设有圆形喷水池，左右为荷花池。

sentences.english: This pool, clear to the bottom, is said to be the "Xi Shi River Port".
sentences.chinese: 这水池清澈见底，传说是“西施河埠”。

sentences.english: The sitcom finished. She took the empty cups to the sink.
sentences.chinese: 情景喜剧结束了，她把空杯子放进了水池。

sentences.english: In the middle of the forest there was a fountain.
sentences.chinese: 森林中央有一座喷水池。

sentences.english: One day a little girl was sitting and watching her mother do the dishes at the kitchen sink.
sentences.chinese: 一天一个小女孩正坐着看妈妈在厨房水池边洗碗碟。

sentences.english: Tuotuo was sitting near the water and watching the moon rise, there was an urge to howl.
sentences.chinese: 脱脱坐在水池边抬头看月亮，有一种想嚎叫的冲动。

sentences.english: The statue is a large pool below.
sentences.chinese: 雕像下面是一个大水池。

sentences.english: SECOND SOLDIER: It is an old cistern.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个古代的蓄水池。

definition: pond/bathhouse pool/dance floor of a ballroom/(old) stalls (front rows in a theater)
mouth of a spring or fountain
Yuchi or Yuchih township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
